In England, in the seven days to 08 October, there were 207,435 new confirmed cases (366.8 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 01 October, there were 189,733 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 9% (17,702 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 13 October is 7,035,489 (12,441.2 cases per 100,000 population).
